experience.title: Full Stack Cloud Developer
description: Implemented enhancements to company administrative interface to bundle accounts, change billing plans, and cancel subscriptions using Stripe API
Helped design and build a webhook delay and aggregation solution using AWS Lambda, SQS and DynamoDB
Building custom objects in Hubspot for tracking customer data in a manner that mirrors internal DB structures
Built a new on-boarding flow for high value Intuit customers to easily transition into agreed-upon wholesale rates using React and Stripe API
Lead transition of acquired Github backup solution BackHub into Rewind development pipeline and became subject matter expert for Rewindâ€™s git backup architecture
Worked after hours week-long on-call shifts, providing quick response technical support for customer issues and system outages
Spearheaded technical investigations and subsequent efforts into new integrations for our Backup product
Peformed manual restores of Quickbooks accounts and Shopify stores using combinations of platform APIs and internal tooling
Assisted in proliferation of the BackHub architecture across AWS regions, providing US-based storage for data sovereignty-minded customers
Designed and lead development on a per-seat billing system leveraging Stripe, spanning multiple AWS account and system architectures
